elements.text: You're at a concert with friends, and everyone starts clapping along to your favorite song. You find that you are struggling to keep the rhythm and begin to panic that this is a sign of your HD progressing. You want to leave the concert early, but you look at the happy faces around you and decide it's better to...
MindTrails provides you with the courage to face uncertain situations, giving you the confidence to approach them in real life.
